short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chat with your tabs using our Chrome extension

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tabchat AI is an extension that lets you chat directly with your active tabs. We securely scrape the HTML data from your DOM, send it over to our LLM, and viola- you're able to receive AI assistance with any website you're currently browsing. The possibilities, as you might imagine, are endless.

Need help with a forum post? Done. Seeing if a product is worth purchasing? We can help. Need to extract data from a table? Piece of cake.

✔ Chat with any tab you have open
✔ Easily extract unstructured data to CSV/JSON
✔ Summarize articles & grab key points
✔ Pick up on hidden context you might not see at first
✔ Enormous 300k context powered by Amazon Nova

Only $9.99/month for unlimited usage- get started with a 7 day free trial!
